summary: Transitive dependency minimist-1.2.5 has critical prototype pollution vulnerability (CVE-2021-44906) with CVSS 9.8 score. The vulnerability exists in swc-loader via loader-utils and json5 dependencies.
userImpact: Applications using the TypeScript SDK are vulnerable to remote prototype pollution attacks through the minimist dependency chain.
rootCause: minimist library version 1.2.5 vulnerable to prototype pollution via setKey() function in index.js (lines 69-95)
proposedFix: Upgrade minimist to version 1.2.6 or higher
resolutionDetails: Issue was automatically closed by WhiteSource as the vulnerable library was removed from the dependency tree or marked as ignored in inventory
keyQuote: Minimist <=1.2.5 is vulnerable to Prototype Pollution via file index.js, function setKey() (lines 69-95).
